name: Geometry Monester
description:
Geometry Monster is an exciting game where players take control of a cute and hungry monster. The aim of the game is to eat as many geometric shapes as possible to score points . However, the game is not without its challenges, as there are bombs scattered throughout the game that must be avoided, or the monster will lose one of its three hearts.

 The player must use their skills and agility to keep the monster alive while scoring as many points as possible. The game features colorful graphics and upbeat music, adding to the fun and engaging gameplay.

The game is suitable for players of all ages and skill levels, offering a fun and challenging experience that is sure to keep players entertained for hours. With its simple controls and addictive gameplay, Geometry Monster is a must-play for anyone who enjoys fast-paced arcade-style games.
